name: Swingo
description:
Welcome to Swingo!
This is me testing out an idea, and just having fun working on a playdate project. Swing the sword to slash the ghosties!

Swing with the crank.
Arrow keys to move.

I'm planning to add a few things:
- Items to pick up after each wave to increase move speed, damage
- Alterations to the swinging mechanics
- Hit effects
- Main menu
- Transitions

We'll see when (if) they ever make it! If there's enough interest I'll spend some time on them.
